typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		STOFF as string,
		MATNR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MARA
MARA derive(ItemRelationshipTypeId = 99999,
		ItemRelationshipNote =  concat ( 'd_' , toString ( currentTimestamp ( ) ) )) ~> ExpRelatedItem
ExpRelatedItem sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	insertable:true,mapColumn(
		ItemSku = MATNR,
		RelatedItemSku = STOFF,
		ItemRelationshipTypeId = ItemRelationshipTypeId,
		ItemRelationshipNote = ItemRelationshipNote
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RelatedItem
